text:
@narendramodi Just one person could end up infecting 406 others with coronavirus within 30 days if we don’t follow the health advice. We can do this but it requires all of us, every single Indian, to step up and do their bit. @MoHFW_INDIA
@jdhankhar1 @TOIOpinion
